author: Maddie

text: This didn't even used the Genesis full potential! One of the sound chips is idle the entire time, and there are no samples whatsoever. I'm not bashing the soundtrack, the compositions are superb... yet this could've sounded much better, if Konami have putted a bit more effort into the game. Rocket Knight Adventures and Contra Hard Corps, are with much more richer sound.
author: Radoslav Mitrov

text: Almost every one, after the first wave of games (around 1990), make use of the PSG chip in one way or another.. With the notable exception of the work of Jesper Kyd.

text:
This game was Yamane's Castlevania debut. I always go with John Morris since I prefer the classic whip over the lance.

I'm still waiting for the next handheld (probably 3DS) Castlevania from IGA. That and Lords of Shadow's DLC content which should be coming out soon.
